data.title: CAROL EVANS One of the largest collections of Carol Evans Giclee on Watercolor Paper and Giclee on Canvas in the world .

CAROL EVANS

300 lb. Watercolor

CAROL EVANS

" MISTS OVER LANGARA "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

20" x 28.5" $495

100 s/n Giclee Canvas

30" x 42" $1150

Mist rolls in along

the shoreline of Langara Island,

cloaking headlands, islands and the

great Shaman's Rock in a dreamlike

veil... although the tiny limpets

and anemones in tidepools

take no notice.

" MCLENNAN VALLEY "

CAROL EVANS

195 s/n Giclee Paper 19" x 15" $345

50 s/n Giclee Canvas 19" x 15" $465

" OAK GROVE "

CAROL EVANS

195 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

19" x 29" $495

50 s/n Giclee Canvas

29"x 44" $1175

Off the sandstone shore

of Link Island lies a long ridge

of rock. It holds just enough soil

to support a thick grassy meadow and

a small grove of windswept

garry oaks.

" OCEANS FALLS "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

19" x 32" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

19.75" x 33" $675

These falls were once the

source of power that ran a community

throughout its daily life and industry. With

the passage of time, most of the people

have moved from the town of Ocean

Falls and the forest is

reclaiming the

land.

" PATIENCE "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

18.5" x 13" $325

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

20" x 14" $425

The stately form

of a Great Blue Heron

is illuminated in sunlight as it stands stock still, alert and watching… patiently

waiting.

" PASSAGE TO THE SEA "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

12" x 27"

$395

100 s/n Giclee Canvas 15" x 34"

Email-price

195 s/n Giclee Gallery Wrap Canvas

16" x 36"

$975

At the far

end of West Beach

on Calvert Island we found this

little rock garden. It had a

peaceful, contemplative

feeling similar to that

of a Japanese

garden.

" SAILBOATS OFF BEDDIS BEACH "

CAROL EVANS

350 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

20" x 28" $295

50 s/n Giclee Canvas

20" x 28" $675

The perfect

conditions for sailing

are a lively wind and a sunny day.

Such were the conditions on

this divine May

afternoon.

" REFUGE COVE "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

28" x 18.25" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

30.75" x 20" $675

Gallery Wrap Giclee Canvas

30.75" x 20" $975

..overjoyed

to find gourmet pizza

and fresh cappuccino at the

outdoor cafe of this, the hub -

the downtown of

Desolation

Sound

" MOUNT BAKER "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

20.5" x 31.25"

$675

A line

of cormorants seem

so small and fleeting as they skim

across the water, past the great abiding

presence of Mount Baker, Queen of the

coastal mountains, gracing

the horizon.

" SAND PIPERS AT SUNSET "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n 100% Rag

Watercolor Paper

8" x 8"

$95

195 s/n Giclee Canvas

8" x 8"

$165

One of the 8 by 8

paintings Carol has

done recently.

" SHELL "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n 100% Rag

Watercolor Paper

8" x 8.5"

$95

As

requested,

we now have Shell

available on watercolor

paper.

" SAND PIPERS AT SUNSET "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n 100% Rag

Watercolor Paper

8" x 8"

$95

195 s/n Giclee Canvas

8" x 8"

$165

One of the 8 by 8

paintings Carol has

done recently.

" SUNNY POINT "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Rag Watercolor Paper20" x 31" $495

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

29.5" x 44" $1175

40" x 60" $1550

“ The summer sun

warms the beach, the grassy

meadow and the clear shallows over

a clam bed, on Portland

Island. ”

" SEABOUND STREAM "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

30" x 12" $395 195 s/n Giclee on Canvas

36" x 15" $975

Cold, clear stream water

bursts out from the shade

of the forest into broad

daylight on the

beach...

" SIWASH ROCK "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

20" x 30" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

29.25" x 44" $1150

Gallery Wrap Canvas Giclee

29.25" x 44" $1550

" Amongst all the wonders,

the natural beauties that encircle

Vancouver, the marvel of mountains...

the yawning canyons, the stupendous forest

firs and cedars, Siwash Rock stands as

distinct, as individual, as if dropped

from another sphere. Where

shells have collected along

a seam in the sandstone the

sunlight and clear water

createa glorious,

moving play of

light."

" SUMMER DAY "

CAROL EVANS

195 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

14" x 21.75" $345

100 s/n Giclee Canvas

20" x 31" $675

" Sails radiant with sunlight,

we watched her make her way

across shimmering waters until

she slipped intothe summer

haze between the

islands."

" STREAM IN SHIMMERING SUN "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor on Paper

30" x 12" $395

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

32" x 12.75" $675

As sunshine glints

and glances off twig, leaf

and stone, the little forest valley

is awash in light. At its feet an eager

stream rushes down in full flight

towards Tenedos Bay

and out to sea.

" SUN WARMED SHORE "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Watercolor Paper

19.25" x 32" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

19.75" x 33" $675

Sitting amongst the moss

and grasses, listening to the lapping

water and occasional seagull,

there’s a quiet peace

that soaks into

one’s soul.

" SUNLIT SAILS "

CAROL EVANS

350 s/n Paper

11.875" x 27.875"

$280

" SHELLS IN THE SUNSHINE "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Giclee Watercolor Paper

28" x 20" $495

100 s/n Giclee Canvas

28" x 20" $675

Where shells

have collected along a seam

in the sandstone the sunlight and clear

water create a glorious,

moving play of

light.

" SGAANG GWAII "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Canvas

42" x 30" $1150

195 s/n Giclee 300 lb. Watercolor Paper

28" x 20" $495

" SHADOWS ACROSS SHELLS "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Giclee Watercolor Paper

11 3/8 " x 34" $395

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

13" x 39" $695

16 " x 48" $995

20" x 60" $1495

“ Sunlight pierces

through leaves and feathers

and the little ripples along the shore,

transforming everything with a joyous,

glistening radiance, while quiet,

blue shadows cool the

white shell beach.”

" SUNBEAM "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Watercolor Paper

29" x 19.5" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

33 " x 22" $695

“ A ray of light,

heat and shimmering brilliance

penetrate through the water to shells

below, glancing off the surface and

enveloping all in shining

sunlight. ”

" SOUTH BAY "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

10.75" x 34" $465

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

12" x 38" $675

“ Logs circle the bay,

carried up by storms and high

tides. Spring leaves gleam in the sunshine

and the flood tide slowly climbs up the warm

sand. Only a few feet away, a thousand

creatures - starfish, barnacles,

crabs, mussels - delicately move about,

carrying on their daily lives in the

ocean world beneath the

lapping waves. "

" THE ROWER "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Giclee 300 lb. Watercolor Paper

6" x 10"

$110

" TREES ON THE POINT "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

20.5" x 29" $495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

22.75" x 32" $675

" All is calm and gentle

as the warmth of evening sun

penetrates sandstone and seawater

with a golden haze

of light."

" TIDAL STREAM "

CAROL EVANS

295 s/n Giclee Rag Watercolor Paper

10.5" x 6.75" $110 195 s/n Giclee Canvas

13" x 8.25 $235

"EVERGLOW "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Print

35" x 10.25"

$495

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

37" x 10.75"

$675

" VEILS OF LIGHT "

CAROL EVANS

350 s/n Paper

27" x 18.5"

$305

" SOUTH BEACH"

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Giclee Watercolor Paper

34 " x 10.75" $465

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

38" x 12" $675

" VIEW THROUGH ARBUTUS "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

12.25" x 19" $275

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

13" x 20.25" $395

As requested

View Through Arbutus

is now available in Giclée

paper and canvas...

" YOUNGEST DRUMMER "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Watercolor Paper

13" x 8.25" $135

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

13" x 8.25" $295

s/n Giclee on Canvas

15.75" x 10" $425

During the Pole Raising

ceremony, this young girl was full

of confidence and purpose as she strode

around the grounds,

enthusiastically

drumming.

" WHITE SHELL BEACH "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Paper

12" x 19.5" $345

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

19" x 30.25" $675

Gallery Wrapped Giclee Canvas

19" x 30.25" $675

Early

morning sun beams

across a little white shell

beach on the east side of Tent

Island, creating dancing

patterns of light

in the water.

" AT THE TOP OF THE FALLS "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Water Color Print

21.25" x 30"

$495

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

22.75" x 32"

$675

" Cold, crystal clear water

from the mountains tumbles into

a pool amongst the rocks, collecting

for a moment, before thundering

down to the river

below. "

" FEATHER IN A POOL"

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Print

30" x 21.25"

$495

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

32" x 22.5"

$675

" WARM SUMMER EVENING "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Giclee Water Color Print

18.75 " x 32"

$495

295 s/n Giclee Canvas

19.25" x 33"

$675

295 s/n Giclee on Canvas

25.75" x 44"

$1150

" Waves glisten in light

as the incoming tide creeps

up to the driftwood, creating

beautiful reflecting pools and gently,

relentlessly claims the beach

once more… for a

time."

" SHELLS IN THE SHALLOWS "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Print

19" x 28"

$495

100 s/n Giclee on Canvas

21.5 " x 32"

$675

Rainbow

coloured ripples

do an ever- changing dance

across the ocean floor, reflecting

brightly, off white

clamshells.

" THE POWER & THE MYSTERY "

CAROL EVANS

350 s/n Paper

20" x 12.5"

Email-price

It stood

with strength and

authority, surveying

its surroundings

through those

powerful

eyes.

" MORNINGSHINE "

CAROL EVANS

100 s/n Rag Watercolor Print

18 " x 27.5"

$275

As

requested,

we now have

Morningshine available

on watercolor

paper
